verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%>

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even until <S%H5704><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that enter <S%H935><s%> into the host, <S%H6635><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> shall be the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> about the most holy things: <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%>

And when the camp <S%H4264><s%> setteth forward, <S%H5265><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall come, <S%H935><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and they shall take down <S%H3381><s%> the covering <S%H4539><s%> <S%H853><s%> veil, <S%H6532><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%> with it:

And shall put <S%H5414><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> the covering <S%H3681><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall spread <S%H6566><s%> over <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> it a cloth <S%H899><s%> wholly <S%H3632><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof.

And upon <S%H5921><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> of shewbread <S%H6440><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> thereon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H853><s%> the dishes, <S%H7086><s%> and the spoons, <S%H3709><s%> and the bowls, <S%H4518><s%> and covers <S%H7184><s%> to cover <S%H5262><s%> withal: and the continual <S%H8548><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%>

And they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them a cloth <S%H899><s%> of scarlet, <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> the same with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put in <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof.

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of the light, <S%H3974><s%> and his lamps, <S%H5216><s%> and his tongs, <S%H4457><s%> and his censers, <S%H4289><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the oil <S%H8081><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, wherewith <S%H834><s%> they minister <S%H8334><s%> unto it:

And they shall put <S%H5414><s%> it and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof within <S%H413><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> it upon <S%H5921><s%> a bar. <S%H4132><s%>

And upon <S%H5921><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> it with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> to the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof:

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of ministry, <S%H8335><s%> wherewith <S%H834><s%> they minister <S%H8334><s%> in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them in <S%H413><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue, <S%H8504><s%> and cover <S%H3680><s%> them with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> them on <S%H5921><s%> a bar: <S%H4132><s%>
And they shall take away the ashes <S%H1878><s%> <S%H853><s%> from the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and spread <S%H6566><s%> a purple <S%H713><s%> cloth <S%H899><s%> thereon: <S%H5921><s%>

And they shall put <S%H5414><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, wherewith <S%H834><s%> they minister <S%H8334><s%> about <S%H5921><s%> it, even <S%H853><s%> the censers, <S%H4289><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fleshhooks, <S%H4207><s%> and the shovels, <S%H3257><s%> and the basins, <S%H4219><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the altar; <S%H4196><s%> and they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it a covering <S%H3681><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins, <S%H5785><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> to the staves <S%H905><s%> of it.

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of covering <S%H3680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> as the camp <S%H4264><s%> is to set forward; <S%H5265><s%> after <S%H310><s%> that, <S%H3651><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it: but they shall not <S%H3808><s%> touch <S%H5060><s%> <S%H413><s%> any holy thing, <S%H6944><s%> lest they die. <S%H4191><s%> These <S%H428><s%> things are the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And to the office <S%H6486><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> pertaineth the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light, <S%H3974><s%> and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense, <S%H7004><s%> and the daily <S%H8548><s%> meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the oversight <S%H6486><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and of all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> therein is, in the sanctuary, <S%H6944><s%> and in the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Cut ye not off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8432><s%> the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>

But thus <S%H2063><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> unto them, that they may live, <S%H2421><s%> and not <S%H3808><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> when they approach <S%H5066><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto the most holy things: <S%H6944><s%> <S%H6944><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall go in, <S%H935><s%> and appoint <S%H7760><s%> them every one <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> his service <S%H5656><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> his burden: <S%H4853><s%>
But they shall not <S%H3808><s%> go in <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> when <S%H853><s%> the holy things <S%H6944><s%> are covered, <S%H1104><s%> lest they die. <S%H4191><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> throughout the houses <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers, <S%H1><s%> by their families; <S%H4940><s%>

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou number <S%H6485><s%> them; all <S%H3605><s%> that enter in <S%H935><s%> to perform <S%H6633><s%> the service, <S%H5656><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>
This <S%H2063><s%> is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites, <S%H1649><s%> to serve, <S%H5647><s%> and for burdens: <S%H4853><s%>

And they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> his covering, <S%H4372><s%> and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the badgers' skins <S%H8476><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%>

And the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and by <S%H5921><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> and their cords, <S%H4340><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of their service, <S%H5656><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is made <S%H6213><s%> for them: so shall they serve. <S%H5647><s%>

At <S%H5921><s%> the appointment <S%H6310><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonites, <S%H1649><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> their burdens, <S%H4853><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> their service: <S%H5656><s%> and ye shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> them in charge <S%H4931><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their burdens. <S%H4853><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1649><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and their charge <S%H4931><s%> shall be under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>
As for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> thou shalt number <S%H6485><s%> them after their families, <S%H4940><s%> by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers; <S%H1><s%>

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou number <S%H6485><s%> them, every one <S%H3605><s%> that entereth <S%H935><s%> into the service, <S%H6635><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> <S%H853><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%>

And this <S%H2063><s%> is the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their burden, <S%H4853><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation; <S%H4150><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and the bars <S%H1280><s%> thereof, and the pillars <S%H5982><s%> thereof, and sockets <S%H134><s%> thereof,

And the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about, <S%H5439><s%> and their sockets, <S%H134><s%> and their pins, <S%H3489><s%> and their cords, <S%H4340><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> their instruments, <S%H3627><s%> and with all <S%H3605><s%> their service: <S%H5656><s%> and by name <S%H8034><s%> ye shall reckon <S%H6485><s%> <S%H853><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their burden. <S%H4853><s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari, <S%H4847><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> their service, <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them by their families <S%H4940><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> two thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty. <S%H2572><s%>
